content: ***mystical mushroom dice bag crochet pattern*** this pattern is available for free on my blog or purchase the ad-free printer friendly pdf for a small fee free crochet pattern published on my blog coming saturday 11/25/23 to the blog ✦ mystical mushroom dice bag crochet pattern ✦ easy access your dice by pushing down the top of the bag ✦ bonus --> use your bag as a cute drawstring purse ✦ makes a great gift for the board gamer or role player in your life ✦ simple drawstring closure is easy to open and close ✦ learn to create back post half_double_crochet and front post treble_crochet with photo tutorials ✦ learn to create a magic_ring with with photo and video tutorials --> this is an intermediate crochet pattern with a couple of advanced stitches and a small amount of shaping click here to join my vip facebook community for exclusive discounts cals giveaways and more --> **join the fb group ** 1 **what is included ** 7 page pdf pattern in us english with american crochet terms your pattern is available to download from your ravelry purchases and an email will be sent with a download link as well **sizing ** 8 tall laid flat / 6 tall standing x 6 diameter cap / 3 diameter stem supplies needed ✦ worsted weight yarn ✦ yardage 120 - 160 yards total **stem ** 60-80 yds **cap ** 50-60 yds **spots ** 10-20 yds ✦ hook g/6 4 0 mm hook **stitch key ** slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hdc2tog - decrease by half_double_crochet 2 sts together bphdc - back post half_double_crochet fptr - front post treble_crochet ***green fox farms designs original crochet pattern *** i am here to help if you have any questions feel free to send me a message through my blog or social media fb & ig links below this pattern has been thoroughly tested and tech edited this pattern is my intellectual property you are welcome to make as many as you like sell them give them away etc you may not sell or alter and claim as your own this pattern this pattern may not be mass produced it is for individual use only you may not use my photographs if you want to share this pattern online you must only share a link to my blog you may not copy and paste my text / the pattern to another site thank you for respecting my work thank you lisa fox **my website and blog with other *free* patterns ** www greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/ **find me on etsy ** https //www etsy com/shop/greenfoxfarms follow me i share updates photos and occasional giveaways and sales on my social media pages come join the fun https //www instagram com/greenfoxfarms/ https //www facebook com/greenfoxfarms/ 1 https //www facebook com/groups/greenfoxfarms
